v0.1.3: Mar 6 2012
==================

* Stop generating invalid metric values when batched

v0.1.2: Mar 6 2012
==================

* Limit batch sizes to 8kb to avoid UDP send failures

v0.1.1: Mar 6 2012
==================

* Express-compatible middleware (`metrics.middleware`)
* Batch flushing of metrics

v0.1.0: Feb 26 2012
===================

* Initial public release
